SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am38
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am38.Network.Server

Interface ServerProtocolInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
ImplementerRmi, ImplementerTCP
public interface ServerProtocolInterface
Interface implemented from ImplementerRMI and ImplementerTCP to unify the action of the server with the clients

    • setClientUsername

      void setClientUsername(String s)
      Method that send to the client the username if it is valid the one that it's been chosen
      Parameters:
      s - username validated

    • loginRequest

      String loginRequest(String s) throws ClassNotFoundException, IOException
      Method that send to the client messages for the login phase and get back the response
      Parameters:
      s - message to send to the client
      Returns:
      a string with the response
      Throws:
      ClassNotFoundException
      IOException

    • finalizeInitialization

      void finalizeInitialization(GameThread gt, Player p, boolean reconnect)
      Method that add the player logged in to the game
      Parameters:
      gt - GameThread of the game
      p - player to add
      reconnect - parameter set to true if the player is reconnecting to his previous game

    • confirmedPlacement

      void confirmedPlacement(String nickname, int id, int x, int y, boolean face, int points, VisibleElements symbolTab)
      Method that says to the client that the placement of a card has gone well
      Parameters:
      nickname - of the player that has played the card
      id - id of the card placed
      x - coordinates on player's field
      y - coordinates on player's field
      face - chosen for the card placed
      points - given by the card placed
      symbolTab - VisibleElements updated with the elements given by the card placed

    • ping

      void ping(boolean b)
      Method to exchange ping with the client
      Parameters:
      b - if true start a new ping communication, if false send a ping to the client

    • resendInfo

      void resendInfo(Game game)
      Method to send the information back to a client after a disconnection
      Parameters:
      game - the game to which the player has reconnected

    • confirmedOtherDraw

      void confirmedOtherDraw(GameController gameController, String[] s)
      Method that send updated info about the game to the client after another player has drawn
      Parameters:
      gameController - GameController of the game
      s - the kingdoms of the hand of the player who drawn
